page.title: 14PRIMARY SCHOOLS, DUNDEE.
page.content:
Gowriehill School is a Primary School.It caters for{5}to{12}year old,it has{265}children in the school.It also has a special unit,it started in August 1984 with{2}children and has now grown to{9}children.They are ordinary children but they find it hard to learn.Gowriehill has its own kitchen.It is run by a cook and{2 helpers.On average about{40}children go to dinners each day.{Charleston}was built in{1957.}The amount of children that will be coming to{Charleston}in{ {1985}is{300.}But that is not many compared to{August 1965}when they had{ {763}pupils. they have{18}staff,{6}of which are cooks and{11}of which are teachers.The average number of people that go to school dinners is{125.}They have their own kitchen and dinner hall
{ }
